headline: Is It Time To Reassess NRG Energy (NRG) After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether NRG Energy's current share price lines up with its underlying value, this article will walk you through what the numbers are really saying. NRG Energy recently closed at US$149.11, with a 7 day return of 0.5% decline, a 30 day return of 10.3% decline, and a 1 year return of 47.0%. The 3 year and 5 year returns are described as very large. Recent coverage has focused on NRG Energy's share price performance and how investors are reacting to the company's position...

headline: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on NRG Energy Stock?
summary: NRG Energy has outperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts are cautiously optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
